summary: While preparing for a camping trip, Fred Flintstone is enlisted by the Bedrock Secret Service to capture a criminal mastermind after a spy who looks like him is injured on the job.
cast: Alan Reed|Mel Blanc|Jean Vander Pyl|Gerry Johnson|Don Messick|Janet Waldo|Paul Frees|Harvey Korman|John Stephenson|June Foray
keywords: bound and gagged|tied to a chair|machine gun|enemy agent|fred flintstone character
title: El super agente Picapiedra
